name: Engelbert Hubbers
content: Engelbert Hubbers Engelbert Hubbers Lecturer - Radboud University Home Teaching Publications Contact Since 2001 I have been working in several positions within the Institute for Computing and Information Sciences of the Radboud University in Nijmegen. Currently I am employed as a lecturer within the Digital Security Group. As a lecturer my time is almost fully devoted to teaching, which automatically implies that my research is typically limited to supervision of thesis projects. Activities besides teaching: Member of the Representative Council Faculty of Science (from September 2025) Member of the Examination Board for Science Education (from July 2024) Member of the Examination Board for Computing Science and Information Sciences (from January 2021) Member of the Program Committee (until January 2021) Current research interests: Logic Coq Discrete Mathematics Electronic voting systems Contact Room M1.03.11a Mercator 1 Digital Security Group (iCIS) Radboud University Toernooiveld 212 6525 EC Nijmegen The Netherlands hubbers (at) cs.ru.nl Linkedin Google Scholar ORCID Last modified on September 11, 2025
